long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A beautiful touch-screen friendly dashboard. 

It includes a clock, weather, a to-do list, and quick links to get you where you need to be.

All settings are saved after you have pressed the back button on the Settings page. The changes will be applied on the next reload. Note that images must be 5MB and below.

Original GitHub release: https://github.com/ariellebryn/newday

Released under the MIT licence
